subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
Please listen i just want you to know that in this new reason we have just gone our files in the central computer here in CBN and we have find out that you are one of the Beneficiaries that has not received your fund from the central bank payment process release last year. so i will advice you to listen evey well now you have not received your fund since years in the past one of the reasons is that the offical worked with did not tell you the truth of the matter and you keep on sending them money that is bad, so now we have find out that you will need this three documents to back up your fund updated from this Jan 8th 2024 if you have the below named documents stamed from Jan 8th 2024 send them over to me here so that we will call the bank lawyer to come over here immediately and stand on your be half for the signing of your payment transfer into your account. but if you do not have the updated documents please let us know immediately for the lawyer to move today and get all the documents as your fund back up once that you done please do reconfirm your account details and your address with a copy of your international passport or ID CARD thank you as i await for your reply details and information back to me now as here are the names of the documents.
A,  Anti-Terrorist certificate
B,  Money Laundry certificate.
C,  Drug free laundry certificate.
Note; please i am waiting for your reply now .
We look forward hearing from you.
Best Regards,
Mr Jonas Morell.
Deputy Governor, Financial System Stability,
Central Bank of Nigeria.

subject: Re:    Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Jonas Morell,

Thank you for reaching out to me and bringing this matter to my attention. I appreciate your concern regarding the funds that I have not received from the central bank payment process.

I understand that there may have been some issues in the past, and I'm glad that you have discovered this and are willing to assist me in resolving it. However, before proceeding further, I would like to gather more information about the documents you mentioned.

Could you please provide me with some additional details about these documents? What exactly do they entail, and why are they necessary for the transfer of my funds? Also, could you clarify what you mean by "stamped from Jan"?

Furthermore, I would like to ensure that all necessary precautions are taken to protect my personal information. Is there a secure way for me to provide you with my account details and identification without any risk?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Vicki

subject: Dear Vicki, The stamped i mean is approved . Reply now as we are on the process awaiting
body:
Dear Vicki,

Thank  you for your reply back to us with out your account details bear in
mind that we will need for the release of your fund ( 10.5m dollars) so you
should understand that we will need your account details reconfirmed to mky
office immediately so that there will not be any mistake. but like as i
have said from day one that what stopped you from having your fund released
to you since is that the people you have worked in the past did not tell
you truth . so now what we only have to confirm from you is that if you
have this three documents that will back up your fund once it is released
and transfer into your account so that no office can stop your fund once it
is transfer to youe account that is the meaning of the stampped approved by
CENTRAL BANK. so let us know now if you have this documents as it is below
here updated from 8th Jan 2024 but if you do not  have them let me know so
that the bank lawyer can get them on your behalf and stamp them for the
transfer of your fund into your account the documents will stand as
security to your fund release to you since you are not here in person . so
please here are the names of the documents below you should should not
delay any more reply us back with the reqruired information before 2hrs
from now as we are in the process and the lawyer can go on time to have the
documents if you do not have updated once with you  please your reply
should come with out delay again now for actions as i have said here are
the names of the documents.

A,  Anti-Terrorist certificate

B,  Money Laundry certificate.

C,  Drug free laundry certificate.

Please if you have any of the documents updated up to 8th Jan send them to
me now but if you do not have any let us know i will call the lawyer to
tell you his service conditions so that he can get them immediately for the
transfer of your fund i am waiting for your answers back to my office now
thank you for your understanding.

I await your urgent response.

Yours faithfully,
Best Regards,

Mr Jonas Morell.

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Jonas Morell,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate your willingness to help me with the release of my funds. However, I have a few questions regarding the documents you mentioned.

1. What is the purpose of document A?
2. Can you please explain what "Money Laundry" refers to in document B?
3. Similarly, what does "Drug free laundry" mean in document C?

I want to make sure I fully understand the purpose and significance of these documents before proceeding further. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Vicki

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Attention Vicki,

Thank you my dear for your reply and quetions about the three documents.
now listen the documents are to prove that your fund here has nothing to do
with Drugs or Laundry so once this documents are here now with your names
and details that means that your fund is approved for transfer to your and
no other office or agentcy that will have power to stop your fund once it
is transfer out to your account. so sir that is the reason and once we have
the documents today i will attach them all and send them over to you
immedidately so that the copies will be here as a security to your fund
release and here is the update after i have called the lawyer that will
stand on your behalf to have them on your behalf today so i will advice you
to try and see how you can come up and do not delay in replying me again
for the sake time as I have come in conclusion with the Bank lawyer who is
approved by the bank and was giving the power to touch any sensitive
document like yours. so if you want to confirm your self from the lawyer
there is no problem about that sir. now listen the lawyer said that for him
to have the three required documents from the legal department and stamp
them that all will cost you $277 dollars only and bear in mind that once
the documents are here i will attach them and send them over to you as
security to your fund once it is transfer to your account and now he said
that he is ready to move before they will close for the day so if you are
ready let me know so that we can give you the information to send the $277
dollars only that is all thank you as i am waiting here for your reply
immediately.


We look forward hearing from you.
Best Regards,
Mr Jonas Morell.
Deputy Governor, Financial System Stability,

subject: Re: Attention Vicki, The documents are to prove that your fund is genuine all your questions are answered reply and let us proceed
body:
Dear Mr. Jonas Morell,

Thank you for your prompt response and for providing me with more information about the three documents. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that my fund transfer is not hindered by any external factors.

I understand the importance of these documents in proving that my funds are legitimate and have no association with illegal activities. It's reassuring to know that once these documents are in place, my fund transfer will be approved without any further delays.

Could you please provide me with more details about the specific documents that are required? I would like to have a clear understanding of what needs to be done before proceeding further.

Additionally, I would like to confirm the legitimacy of the lawyer you mentioned. Could you please share his contact information so that I can reach out to him directly? It would give me peace of mind to verify his credentials before proceeding with any financial transactions.

Regarding the cost of obtaining these documents, could you please clarify if the amount you mentioned is in US dollars? Also, could you provide me with the payment instructions so that I can arrange for the necessary funds?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to receiving your response and moving forward with this process.

Best wishes,
Vicki

subject: Re: Attention Vicki, The documents are to prove that your fund is genuine all your questions are answered reply and let us proceed
body:

$277 USA Dollars  only,

Please (Use Western Union Or Ria Money transfer only)

Yours faithfully,

Mr. Jonas Morell,

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Jonas Morell,

Thank you for your prompt response and for providing me with more information about the three documents. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that my fund is not associated with any illegal activities.

I understand that once these documents are in place, my fund will be approved for transfer to my account without any interference from other offices or agencies. That's great news!

Could you please explain to me what exactly these documents are? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of their purpose and how they will secure the release of my funds.

Also, you mentioned that you have already spoken to the lawyer who will handle this matter on my behalf. Could you provide me with his contact information so that I can verify his credentials? It would give me peace of mind to confirm his involvement directly.

Regarding the cost of obtaining these documents, could you please clarify if the amount you mentioned is in US dollars? Additionally, how should I proceed with making the payment? Do you accept bank transfers or is there another preferred method?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to receiving further instructions from you.

Best wishes,
Vicki

subject: Re: Attention Vicki, Here is the contact of the lawyer . please do all the needful now because of time
body:
Hello Mr. Jonas Morell,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with the contact information of the lawyer, Barrister Mark Anderson. I appreciate your efforts in helping me with this matter.

Before I proceed, could you please provide me with more details about the documents that need to be sent? What are these documents for and why are they necessary for the transfer of funds?

Additionally, could you clarify what exactly needs to be done with regards to sending the payment? You mentioned using Western Union or Ria Money transfer, but I would like to understand the process better before proceeding.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Vicki

body:
Hello Mr. Jonas Morell,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I understand that you have explained the questions before, but I just want to make sure I have a clear understanding of everything. Vicki

subject: Re: Attention Vicki, This are the last answers to your questions i await for actions or over
body:
Hello Vicki,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about the documents needed for my fund transfer. It's good to know that once these documents are in place, there won't be any obstacles in getting the funds transferred to my account.

I understand your point about using USA Dollars for clarity purposes. It makes sense to use a currency that is universally understood. However, before proceeding with the transfer, I have a few questions:

1. Could you please explain in more detail what these documents are and why they are necessary? I want to make sure I fully understand the process.

2. Is there a specific deadline by which I need to send the required amount through Western Union or Ria Money transfer? I want to ensure that everything is done within the given timeframe.

3. Can you provide some more information about Miss Naruemon Phontham? What is her role in this process?

4. Are there any additional fees or charges associated with this transfer? It would be helpful to know all the costs involved upfront.

I look forward to your prompt response and clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Vicki

However, before I proceed with sending any money, could you please provide me with more details about the purpose of these documents? What exactly do they entail and why are they necessary?

Additionally, I would like to know more about Miss Naruemon Phontham. Could you please share some background information about her and her role in this process? It would help me feel more confident and informed before proceeding.

I apologize if I seem a bit cautious, but it's important for me to have all the details before taking any further steps. Thank you for your understanding.

Best wishes,
Vicki
